biotools.summary:
A General Code for Calculating Molecular Thermochemistry Properties.

Shermo is essentially open-source. The source code (written in Fortran) can be freely obtained by simply sending an E-mail to me, the only requirement is clearly indicating your name and affiliation in the mail.

bioschemas.name: Shermo
